summary:
Welcome to the magical world of NFT - Discover over 200+ magical artifacts, hunt deadly beasts with incredible strength and unique abilities.

 NFT collector and autobattler game - In addition to staking, Boomcoin also provides an immersive NFT (Non-Fungible Token) gaming experience. Users can dive into a captivating NFT game where they can collect, trade, and play with unique digital assets. Through their engagement in the game, users can earn BPTM tokens as rewards, adding an exciting incentive to explore and conquer new gaming challenges.

 Play to earn - Discover over 200+ magical artifacts, hunt deadly beasts with incredible strength and unique abilities.

 Collect crystals - Introducing "Collect Crystals," where you embark on a captivating journey to gather and own precious digital gems...

 Fight creatures - Prepare yourself for an epic gaming experience like no other! Enter the thrilling world of Fight Creatures...

 Learn potions - Delve into the captivating realm of NFT games and embark on a magical journey where you can learn the ancient...

 Look for artifacts - Dive into the Exciting World of NFT Games and Uncover Rare and Valuable Relics!

 Find creatures - Find Creatures: Explore the Thrilling World of NFT Games and Encounter Mysterious and Enchanting Beings!

 Collect herbs - Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of NFT games, where you gather and cultivate rare botanical treasures!

 Shop with us & get Cashback! - Boomcoin goes beyond just a cryptocurrency by offering users the ability to use their BPTM tokens for everyday purchases. By partnering with various merchants, Boomcoin enables users to buy products and services while earning BPTM as a cashback. This cashback system provides a seamless way for users to accumulate more BPTM tokens as they shop, adding value and utility to their crypto holdings.

 Collect stunning pieces of digital asset & stake! - Whether it’s through staking, gaming, or shopping, Boomcoin (BPTM) creates a vibrant ecosystem that allows users to actively participate and earn rewards. With its diverse range of earning opportunities, Boomcoin aims to empower users and enhance their crypto experience, making it an enticing choice for crypto enthusiasts and newcomers alike.
